title: Crystorama 5114-OS-CL-MWP Crystal Accents Four Light Mini Chandeliers from Regis collection in Pwt, Nckl, B/S, Slvr.finish,
features: Four Light Mini Chandeliers from the Regis collection
Number of Lights: 4, Bulb(s) Included: No
description: Crystorama 5114-OS-CL-MWP Regis 4LT Mini-Chandelier will add timeless elegance to any home. The warm Olde Silver finish accentuates the sparkle of exquisite Clear Hand Cut Crystal in a charming piece that will add romance to any room in your home. Swarovski Spectra is a beautiful value. A passion for perfection has made Swarovski the world leader in the production of cut crystal, and Swarovski & Co. has created a new alternative quality crystal. Swarovski has used advanced technology with old world knowledge to produce a brilliant crystal with precision cutting and superior light reflection. This crystal type is designed for a crystal connoisseur demanding quality at an affordable price. The 5114-OS-CL-MWP is 17.5IN in diameter x 25IN tall. The 5114-OS-CL-MWP comes one per package, and requires four (4) 60W candelabra base incandescent lamps (not included), dimmable using a standard incandescent dimmer. Crystorama was founded in Brooklyn, New York in 1958 by Abraham Kleinberg. The company was initially founded as a primary importer of crystal and brass chandeliers from Bohemia - Northern Czechoslovakia - offering the finest selection of classical designs. Throughout the last five decades, Crystorama has evolved into a dominant producer of interior decorative chandeliers. Crystorama has focused their efforts by taking their vast design experience and fusing it with current inspirations to produce fashion forward styles. Crystorama produces lighting collections for the traditionalist, minimalist and even the smallest customers. The lighting styles feature a mix of metals, finishes and crystals, and the inspirations are reflected in Crystorama's designs. Crystorama is proud to set the stage for decorative lighting yesterday, today and for tomorrow. Every Crystorama light has a story to tell. Create one with yours.

Finish: Olde Silver, Crystal: All Clear Majestic Wood Polished, Light Bulb: (4)60w B10 Cand C Incand Regis 4-Light Chandelier. Dressed in classic clear crystal is a perfect match for any traditional setting. Best selling collection for decades.
